analysis.key_quote: the part of this plan aimed at forcing the At Will election for federal employees who have spent the last several years of their lives working the job promised to them as a federal employee and stripping them of the job protections promised them as much as ten years ago, is wrong.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed changes that would strip existing federal employees of their job protections, emphasizing the importance of due process and employee rights, which aligns with concerns about the merit-based system.
